snippet: The Madison Square Garden Company said that the average price of Knicks season tickets would increase 4.9 percent next season, while Rangers season tickets will rise 9.5 percent.
abstract: The Madison Square Garden Company said that the average price of Knicks season tickets would increase 4.9 percent next season, while Rangers season tickets will rise 9.5 percent.

headline.main: Knicks and Rangers Prices Rise Again
